"Stay on the Job" rally for J. A. Jones Construction Company
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Three men are in foreground, one standing at a podium in front of a crowd of people. A billboard is in the background.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Billboards; J. A. Jones Construction Company, Inc.; Laborers; Rallies; Soldiers; War rallies
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Images SPE 0010 and SPE 0020 are from the same event and date.
